channel.title: A hard question
channel.description:
Hello,
I was wondering if it would be difficult to make it so after you vote, you can simply log in-to game type vote and you claim a reward. But you can only claim the reward if you have voted. I think it might have something to do with mysql. I would like some advice, help and to be pointed in the right direction.
Thank you for reading
Pk george1

item.title: A hard question
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Thank you for the feedback and help

Read full topic

item.title: A hard question
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

Yes you can do that by using MySQL i have done it before for a test.
Go learn MySQL for java its really easy to do trust me.

Read full topic
